channel.title: Need some help on my 562
channel.description:
Ok, so im using a limescape base and i want to add in the following items; Zammy dhide (top), Red cape (from SoulWars), Blue cape (from SoulWars), Keris (The dagger), And Moonclan top.
I would also like to add stats for Vesta, Statius... Etc.
Please only post if you know how to fix it
and i also need to add in a donation system
Ooh Also!!!!! how do i edit an Interface
